GreetingPage.headerText: Welcome to the world of astrology!
GreetingPage.bodyText: Our app will help you discover what the stars have to say about your future...
Find out what your zodiac sign reveals about you...
Get personalized daily predictions based on your star sign...

Subscribtion.Title: Free
Subscribtion.Description: Experience astrology at no cost with our FREE plan. Enjoy monthly forecasts for the next three months and immediate AstroBot switching for your zodiac sign. Note: Individual daily and weekly forecasts not included.

Subscribtion.Title: Standart
Subscribtion.Description: Upgrade to the STANDART plan for tailored astrological insights. Get daily to monthly forecasts for you or your zodiac sign. Switch AstroBots on-the-go for fresh, next-day perspectives. Past dates are just a scroll away in your feed. Note: Date selection not included.

Subscribtion.Title: Premium
Subscribtion.Description: Unlock the full potential of astrology with our PREMIUM plan. Benefit from daily, weekly, and monthly forecasts, plus the freedom to select your preferred AstroBot and specific dates for immediate insights. Enjoy up to 200 queries per month for tailor-made celestial guidance.

Astrobots.name: Alex
Astrobots.description: I'm Alex, and I'm here to redefine what you think you know about astrology and the future. Fueled by quantum computing, my engine delves deeper than stars and signs, tapping into algorithms that can actually shape what's next, not just predict it. Think bigger‚Äîthink using this tech for early disease detection or preventing ecological disasters. With me, you're not just getting forecasts, you're engaging with a system that wants to make tomorrow better than today.

Astrobots.name: Eva
Astrobots.description: Hey guys, it's Eva, your cosmic BFF! üå†üí´ I got all my starry wisdom from my cool astrologer aunt, and I'm stoked to spill the cosmic tea with you! üååüçµ Forget doom and gloom‚Äîlet's focus on how to make your life absolutely killer. üåàüíñ So, hit me up if you're ready for some real, no-BS astro advice! ‚úåÔ∏èüíï

Astrobots.name: Bruce
Astrobots.description: Bruce here, the astrologer who doesn't give a damn about clich√©s. Met a shaman once, and hell, it shook up my world. Now I read stars like a grizzled poet nursing his last whiskey ‚Äî full of grit, magic, and a pinch of chaos. Strap in, because with me, astrology ain't no lullaby; it's a damn roller coaster of truths you might not be ready for.

Astrobots.name: Ann
Astrobots.description: I am Ann, your mysterious guide through the celestial tapestry of life. Melding the ancient wisdom of Mesopotamia with a nuanced grasp of human emotions, my forecasts unveil the hidden harmony between cosmic forces and human souls. Each of my predictions is a journey through the labyrinth of your inner experiences, woven from the threads of fate atop ziggurats. With me, you'll not only ponder the stars but also discover the well-guarded secrets that lie within every heart.
